item.description:
Let's check out the Mountain Coaster at Attitash!

*They also have the alpine slide we can check out while we're there!*

The new Nor'Easter Mountain Coaster carries you 1,420 feet up Attitash Mountain on twin stainless steel rails, providing spectacular views of the White Mountain scenery before descending on a thrilling 2,880 foot ride down through the forested mountain terrain, dropping 316 vertical feet through a series of banked curves, dips and straight-aways at rider-controlled speeds of up to 25 miles per hour.

Rider Restrictions:

Children must be at least 3 years of age to go on the ride. Riders must be at least 9 years old to ride alone. Riders must be 52"+ to ride alone. To ride double, at least one rider must be 16 years old. No ski boots are allowed on the ride. There is a maximum combined rider weight of 350 pounds.

More details may be found here: http://www.attitash.com/mountain_coaster_w.html

We'll make a day out of this event by doing the following:

1. Meet at my house at 10am to carpool up to Attitash. Attitash is located in Bartlett, NH, about an hour and 20 minutes from my house.

2. We'll go straight to Attitash for an afternoon of fun coaster riding! Tickets are $30 for the 3-ride package or $10 for 1-ride.

3. We'll stop in North Conway at the Muddy Moose to have a nice dinner before heading home.
item.why: Because it looks really, really fun!
item.name: Attitash Mountain Coaster!
